attributes.action: Give key workers 20% extra wages for keeping the country working.
attributes.additional_details: I think its only fair if people are sitting at home and getting 80% for the key worker like ie hospital staff fire fighters and police and other key workers should get more.
attributes.background: So if people are getting 80% wages for siting at home on ferlow I think key workers should get 20% extra wages for working full time.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on key worker salaries outside of the public sector are a matter for employers.

You might like to sign or share these petitions:

Give government workers a fair pay rise https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328754
